regions.name: Frontal Lobe
regions.functions: Involved in decision making, problem solving, and planning.
regions.relatedResearch: Research on cognitive functions and executive processes.

regions.name: Parietal Lobe

regions.name: Occipital Lobe
regions.relatedResearch: Research on visual perception and processing.
